circumstances: The pilot started the descent to Piedras Negras by night with a limited visibility due to poor weather conditions (drizzle and mist). Too low, the single engine aircraft struck the slope of a hill located 16 km from Piedras Negras Airport. Two passengers were seriously injured while nine other occupants were killed.
probable_cause: Controlled flight into terrain after the pilot decided to continue the descent in below minima weather conditions.
